content: Eliphaz Says the Innocent Do Not Suffer
â€œIf one ventures a word with you, will you become impatient?
But who can refrain from speaking?
And you have strengthened weak hands.
Your words have helped the stumbling to stand,
And you have strengthened feeble knees.
But now it comes to you, and you are impatient;
It touches you, and you are horrified.
Is your fear  not your confidence,
And the integrity of your ways your hope?
